task.title: How to Choose and Customize Notification Features
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to choose from a variety of Notification Features.

prereq.p: Determine your preferred notification type: visual or auditory.

step.cmd: Choose between visual (banner, badge) and auditory (alarm, tone) alerts.
Toggle the vibration option to "On" if you wish to add a vibration alert along with your chosen auditory or visual notification.
Adjust the volume and visual appearance settings as preferred and save.

taskbody.result: Customized notifications will alert you about medication times in your chosen method, reducing the chance of missed doses.
taskbody.example: Mike prefers visual notifications because he often keeps his phone on silent mode. He selects the banner notification option with a distinctive icon for his diabetes medication reminder. Now, whenever it's time to take his medication, a clear banner pops up on his phone's screen, ensuring he sees the reminder even if his phone is on silent.
